strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Move the object to a more stable position before attempting to pick it up again.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: If a cup starts to slip, adjust its position to ensure better stability before lifting.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Re-evaluate and adjust the hand placement or tool usage for better control and support.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Switch from using one hand to two hands when picking up a heavier object.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Use lifting tools such as tongs, a gripper, or gloves to assist in handling difficult objects.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Use tongs to pick up a hot pan from the stove if bare hands aren’t sufficient.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Use a non-slip mat or hold the object with additional support to prevent further movement or slipping.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Place a non-slip mat under a vase to ensure it remains in place during the lift.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Reduce speed and focus more on precision to prevent errors during the lifting process.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: If a heavy box is difficult to lift, slow down and lift it with more control.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Ensure the correct posture and lifting technique to avoid strain and improve control over the object.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Bend at the knees rather than the waist when lifting a heavy item to reduce the risk of injury.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Take a moment to stop, assess the situation, and ensure a safer approach to pick up the object.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Pause to check your grip if you feel the object is slipping during the lift.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Clear any obstacles or clutter in the area to create a safer and more efficient pickup space.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Move objects around to create a clear path before attempting to lift a box.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Request help for lifting large or difficult objects to prevent injury and ensure proper handling.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Ask someone to help lift a heavy item such as a piece of furniture to prevent strain.

strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.description: Verify the object’s identity or state before attempting to pick it up again to avoid mistakes.
strategies_for_recovery_from_failed_stat.example: Confirm the item you're about to lift is not fragile or heavy beyond your capacity.
